name: Ekei
description: Ekei is revolutionizing logistics with the Supply Cloud: a global, provider-agnostic platform unifying freight forwarding and fulfillment. By leveraging automation, AI-driven optimization, and decentralized data sharing, we slash costs, reduce emissions, and enable seamless collaboration across the entire supply chain.
one_liner: Ekei is revolutionizing logistics with the Supply Cloud: a global, provider-agnostic platform unifying freight forwarding and fulfillment. By leveraging automation, AI-driven optimization, and decentralized data sharing, we slash costs, reduce emissions, and enable seamless collaboration across the entire supply chain.
